name: Super Ice Girl
description:
A game made in 2 and a half days for Marcos Game Dev Jam 3, organized by my teacher Marcos Fuchter from the Marcos Game Dev channel

The theme was: "PHYSICS"
So decided to present 3 types of physics:

  • The Physics of snowballs,
  • The Physics of trampoline,
  • And the physics of water.

And this is the result, I hope you like it.sorry for the badly done trampoline plz

ButtonCredits: ;u;FireVictoryMusicSnowballJumpFlag

Joystick pra Esquerda Games
